name: Keep
headline: The open-source AIOps platform
description: Keep is an open-source AIOps platform. Keep acts as a single pane of glass to all your alerts from any monitoring tool and helps you turn 1000s into just 10s of meaningful alerts.

founders.name: Tal Borenstein, Founder
founders.description: Formerly an engineering manager, now CEO. Tech-savvy with vast experience leading software teams of SaaS products.

founders.name: Shahar Glazner, Founder
founders.description:
Passionate about building stuff. Less is more. Long-distance runner.
Occasionally (hopefully more) writes on shaharglazner.medium.com

I'm Technical
Swiss-knife for managing alerts/events at scale
Enrichment, workflows, single pane of glass, 90+ integrations.
**The Open-SourceAIOps Platform**
For those who deal with alerts in a complex environment, leverage AI for your IT Operations.
[Try Keep for free](https://www.keephq.dev/<https:/platform.keephq.dev/providers>)[Talk to us](https://www.keephq.dev/</meet-keep>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66adeb018210ff2165886994/66b0f1455b798a7ab7a06713_Path.png)
![Feature set UI](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66adeb018210ff2165886994/67264465372f79420d754a49_Keep_alert_light.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66adeb018210ff2165886994/66b0f1455b798a7ab7a06713_Path.png)
From SREs, operators to engineers, startups and global enterprises - reliable teams choose Keep
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66adeb018210ff2165886994/66b0e7aca51f637eb02b68ec_Rakuten.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66adeb018210ff2165886994/67719f146c239d960d93c0f5_HiBob.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66adeb018210ff2165886994/67719f26aba28ded77b50260_radiusAI.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66adeb018210ff2165886994/66b0e7ac8b35bc810ed0bb8c_Retool.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66adeb018210ff2165886994/66b0e7ac3043fd409b49ce3b_airtel-1.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66adeb018210ff2165886994/66b0e7accb3a490b79ad6c38_monday-ar21-1.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66adeb018210ff2165886994/66b0e7ac50cfb8d925b3377e_siemens-ar21.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66adeb018210ff2165886994/66b0e7acf1b8e0e264e112b8_Wolter_kluwer-1.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66adeb018210ff2165886994/66b0e7ac5ee0c307a6beec79_Ikea-1.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66adeb018210ff2165886994/66b0e7ac50cfb8d925b33783_Ikea-2.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66adeb018210ff2165886994/66cae10aae64d57ad979f98f_Autodoc_Logo_2018.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66adeb018210ff2165886994/66b0e7aca51f637eb02b68ec_Rakuten.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66adeb018210ff2165886994/67719f146c239d960d93c0f5_HiBob.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66adeb018210ff2165886994/67719f26aba28ded77b50260_radiusAI.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66adeb018210ff2165886994/66b0e7ac8b35bc810ed0bb8c_Retool.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66adeb018210ff2165886994/66b0e7ac3043fd409b49ce3b_airtel-1.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66adeb018210ff2165886994/66b0e7accb3a490b79ad6c38_monday-ar21-1.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66adeb018210ff2165886994/66b0e7ac50cfb8d925b3377e_siemens-ar21.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66adeb018210ff2165886994/66b0e7acf1b8e0e264e112b8_Wolter_kluwer-1.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66adeb018210ff2165886994/66b0e7ac5ee0c307a6beec79_Ikea-1.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66adeb018210ff2165886994/66b0e7ac50cfb8d925b33783_Ikea-2.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66adeb018210ff2165886994/66cae10aae64d57ad979f98f_Autodoc_Logo_2018.png)
STEP 01: INTEGRATE (OSS, CLOUD, ENTERPRISE)
High-quality integrations
... with monitoring systems, IRM, ticketing, source control, change management, and CMDB. Keep's integration system is bidirectional, keeping alerts and signals in sync.
[AppDynamics](https://www.keephq.dev/<https:/docs.keephq.dev/providers/overview>)[ Datadog](https://www.keephq.dev/<https:/docs.keephq.dev/providers/overview>)[Jira](https://www.keephq.dev/<https:/docs.keephq.dev/providers/overview>)[Pagerduty](https://www.keephq.dev/<https:/docs.keephq.dev/providers/overview>)[More...](https://www.keephq.dev/<https:/docs.keephq.dev/providers/overview>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66adeb018210ff2165886994/66b4ee7b378a6cbe850e5610_image%202.png)
STEP 01: INTEGRATE (OSS, CLOUD, ENTERPRISE)
High-quality integrations
STEP 2: COLLECT & QUERY (OSS, CLOUD, ENTERPRISE)
A single pane of glass for alerts
Common Express Language provides advanced querying, slicing, and data analysis capabilities, while rule-based grouping reduces noise and improves data clarity.
![Feature set UI](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66adeb018210ff2165886994/66e1181b825609087f97111b_Alerts%20Overview.png)
STEP 2: COLLECT & QUERY (OSS, CLOUD, ENTERPRISE)
A single pane of glass for alerts
STEP 3: AUTOMATE (OSS, CLOUD, ENTERPRISE)
Workflow engine
Similar to GitHub Actions, based on YAML, but with UI!**Query MySQL** , enrich alerts with query results, **update Jira tickets** , and execute Python scripts seamlessly.
![Feature set UI](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66adeb018210ff2165886994/67264ad5da54fc946d8c4d3f_Card_workflow_light.png)
![Feature set UI](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66adeb018210ff2165886994/6726491baca8c9d3707539aa_Keep_workflow_light.png)
STEP 3: AUTOMATE (OSS, CLOUD, ENTERPRISE)
Workflow engine
STEP 4: AIOPS FOR REAL (KEEP ENTERPRISE ONLY)
Next-gen AIOps
For enterprises managing thousands of daily alerts, Keep provides **alert correlation** based on past incidents and the knowledge base. Leveraging state-of-the-art AI technology and a continuous feedback loop, Keep constantly enhances its performance.
![Feature set UI](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66adeb018210ff2165886994/67262a38d7f0f0e60f72432a_Workflow_engine_light.png)
STEP 4: AIOPS FOR REAL (KEEP ENTERPRISE ONLY)
Next-gen AIOps
Deploy the way you want
Self-hosted
Open Source toolbox for alerts.
[Join our Slack ](https://www.keephq.dev/<https:/getkeep.slack.com/join/shared_invite/zt-2leydxr6s-XmuQtBttgxZ0GOv8MJu6rQ#/shared-invite/email>)[Check GitHub](https://www.keephq.dev/<https:/github.com/keephq/keep>)
Cloud
We take care of the deployment.
[Sign up for free trial](https://www.keephq.dev/<https:/platform.keephq.dev/providers>)
Enterprise
Cloud and on-premises, unique AI-driven alert correlation and summarisation.

STEP 4: AIOPS FOR REAL (KEEP ENTERPRISE ONLY)
Next-gen AIOps
Maintained by awesome Keepers
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66adeb018210ff2165886994/66bb8a5d1adc0c6a948f88d8_Avatars-1.png)
Optimize Your ITOps Stack
Keep, the open-source AIOps and alert management platform, seamlessly integrates with your existing monitoring, incident response, ticketing, source control, change management, and CMDB systems. Our bi-directional providers enable automated alert correlation into high-level incidents and offer robust workflow automation to reduce noise and alert fatigue, significantly lowering your MTTx.
Choose from a wide range of pre-built integrations or customize your own.
[Explore integrations](https://www.keephq.dev/<https:/docs.keephq.dev/providers/overview>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66adeb018210ff2165886994/66b7a110a72952153b1d1df1_Prometheus.png)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66adeb018210ff2165886994/66b7a110e63e989b8d1bea5a_grafana-ar21.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66adeb018210ff2165886994/66b7a111f5f5d1125acd465c_Github.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66adeb018210ff2165886994/66b7a11728b4fd5acc33faa4_Slack.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66adeb018210ff2165886994/66b7a110b2ceab6a1c9c656f_Discord.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66adeb018210ff2165886994/66b7a110843af2b0d89c18df_Prometheus-1.png)
Ready to Efficiently Manage Alerts in Complex Environments?
[Keep Cloud](https://www.keephq.dev/<https:/platform.keephq.dev/providers>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66adeb018210ff2165886994/66ae2283a9cab6312ffdb072_Main_image.png)

generated_description:
### Keep: The Open-Source AIOps Platform Redefining Alert Management

Founded in 2023 and hailing from Tel Aviv-Yafo, Israel, **Keep** is an innovative open-source platform dedicated to improving AIOps (Artificial Intelligence for IT Operations). As a participant in Y Combinator's Winter 2023 batch, Keep aims to be the go-to solution for simplifying alert management across various monitoring tools.

#### Mission Statement
Keep‚Äôs mission is straightforward: it serves as a "single pane of glass" that streamlines thousands of alerts down to just a handful of meaningful ones. This capability is essential for organizations overwhelmed by noise from disparate monitoring systems. 

#### Key Features
- **Integration Simplicity:** Keep seamlessly integrates with over 90 monitoring tools, including popular platforms like Datadog, Grafana, and PagerDuty. This allows users to synchronize alerts across systems and drastically reduce the time spent sorting through noise.
- **Advanced AIOps Functionality:** With its AI-driven capabilities, Keep can correlate alerts, leveraging insights from past incidents to enhance real-time decision-making.
- **User-Friendly Automation:** Users can easily automate workflows using a straightforward interface reminiscent of GitHub Actions, which includes YAML support for complex operations without overwhelming users.

#### Product Offerings
- **Keep Cloud:** The SaaS solution managed by Keep, where users can access its full range of features without needing to set up any infrastructure.
- **Open-Source Toolbox:** For those with specific needs, Keep offers a self-hosted version, allowing businesses to tailor the platform to fit their unique environments and integrate it with their existing tools.
- **Enterprise Options:** Keep provides tailored solutions for large corporations, utilizing sophisticated AI to summarize alerts and minimize alert fatigue.

#### Community & Support
Though currently a small team of five, Keep has already garnered a significant community presence, boasting over 700 community members and 9,200 GitHub stargazers. The company encourages collaboration and innovation within the tech community through open-source development and active engagement via platforms like Slack.

#### Current Events & Engagement
Keep is actively participating in industry events like SRECon25 Americas, reflecting its dedication to engaging with Site Reliability Engineering professionals and fostering useful connections.

### Conclusion
In a world where monitoring and alert systems can quickly become a tangled web, Keep‚Äôs open-source AIOps platform promises to bring clarity and efficiency. With a strong focus on integration and user experience, it's worth keeping an eye on Keep as it continues to grow and evolve.

For more information, visit [Keep Headquarters](https://www.keephq.dev).
